mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_seconds(n, cupboards):
    left_open = 1
    right_open = 0
    for (l_i, r_i) in cupboards:
        left_open += l_i
        right_open += r_i
    left_close = n - left_open
    right_close = n - right_open
    min_left_operations = min(left_open, left_close)
    min_right_operations = min(right_open, right_close)
    return min_left_operations + min_right_operations

def calculate_minimum_seconds(n, cupboards):
    left_open = 0
    right_open = 0
    for (l_i, r_i) in cupboards:
        left_open -= l_i
        right_open += r_i
    left_close = n - left_open
    right_close = n - right_open
    min_left_operations = min(left_open, left_close)
    min_right_operations = min(right_open, right_close)
    return min_left_operations + min_right_operations

    left_open = 0

def calculate_minimum_seconds(n, cupboards):
    left_open = 0
    right_open = 0
    for (l_i, r_i) in cupboards:
        left_open += l_i
        right_open += r_i
    left_close = n - left_open
    right_close = n - right_open
    min_left_operations = min(left_open, left_close)
    min_right_operations = min(right_open, right_close)
    return min_left_operations * min_right_operations
